Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT KIT, NICE CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Rosa Nelly
Reviews.Content: This kit comes with everything that you need for starting right away taking pictures, only complain about the tripod that isn't sturdy at all, made of crapy plastic, you have to buy another a little more expensive, but guessing on the price of the whole package it doesnt matter, i gave away mine cuz i have a good quality spare. And the hdmi cable doesnt fit the camera mini hdmi port. But other than that, this is an amazing kit, amazing lenses and camera.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Sandii
Reviews.Content: widely recommended, the package was very good all the material is of good quality and is everything as they show, the camera is the best on the market and I have only to recommend it widely. was an excellent buy for my

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: C. remus
Reviews.Content: Just a great deal. Nice folks to work with! This camera is fun to work with and easyto understand.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value!!
Reviews.Author: Sherry Courtney
Reviews.Content: Excellent Value! This was a Christmas gift for my adult daughter and she loves it! Nikon is a great camera and this package has all you need to start off right. I would recommend this camera to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Ok. I am verry happy with my new camera
Reviews.Author: SALVADOR CASTELLOTE
Reviews.Content: Excelent camera and complit kit and a good price Nikon is a great tarde mark, a High technology an amaizing optic divice

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: L W Gawlik
Reviews.Content: I have had Nikon products for more than 40 years.  This is my first foray into digital cameras.  We bought this so my son could re-shoot wedding stills that the paid photographer failed to get.  I did wedding photography years ago, so I coached him along, I was pleased with the results.  I am amazed at the power of the little camera mounted strobe. It suffers from all the limitations of a camera mounted strobe, though.  All considered, I am very impressed with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Aighmi*
Reviews.Content: The camera and lenses are wonderful, and the other items in the kit are also excellent.  This was a fabulous birthday present!

Reviews.Title: Nikon D3200 camera bundle
Reviews.Author: Howard P.
Reviews.Content: This is one great outfit for anyone looking to go into a Digital camera..I am still learning about the camera and what I can and can not do..But I ordered a book to help to learn every thing that the booklet does not have in it...Over all it is a great camera....Nikon D3200 24.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G AF-S DX VR and 55-300mm f/4.5-5.6G ED VR AF-S DX NIKKOR Zoom Lenses + EN-EL14 Battery + 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit Nikon D3200 24.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G AF-S DX VR and 55-300mm f/4.5-5.6G ED VR AF-S DX NIKKOR Zoom Lenses + EN-EL14 Battery + 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit

Reviews.Title: love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Sherry
Reviews.Content: this is a great camera.  i need gto get a macro lens, and i will be even more happy.  love it

Reviews.Title: Good value for the money
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: Good value. Takes great pictures and is versatile. While it lacks some of the features of the D5200, I am happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Nice set up
Reviews.Author: Julienne M. Longsworth
Reviews.Content: This is exactly what we were wanting.  My kit was missing the lens cleaning kit, but when I contacted the company, they sent one out quickly.

Reviews.Title: Love the camera and the kit
Reviews.Author: Luke
Reviews.Content: I just love this camera, and the entire kit has been very useful to me in getting my start with DSLR photography. The carrying bag holds everything I need, the extra battery is really an essential part of this kit as is the SD card, and of course having two lenses opens up some more photography potential. I only had one problem, and that was that the card reader did not work, but Focus Camera reimbursed me for it, no problem. If you are looking to get started with DSLR cameras, here is a a great place to start! Not only is the kit good, but Focus Camera's customer service was very kind and helpful. 5 Stars, I would do business with them again in the future and recommend this kit.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera Package for the money
Reviews.Author: Jeremy L. Loomis
Reviews.Content: The is an excellent camera package for the money.  The D3200 is superb and is very easy to us and very fast.  The 55-300mm Telephoto lens is a must have and is excellent at taking picture of birds in my back yard.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Patricia Hernandez
Reviews.Content: Everything is ok whit the Nikon D3200 camera and all accesories. Ultil today is all right iam very happy whir this purchase.Excellent products!

ProductInfo.Features:
Nikon D3200 24.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera Body - Black (Includes manufacturer's supplied accessories)
Nikon 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G AF-S DX VR Nikkor Zoom Lens - Nikon 55-300mm f/4.5-5.6G ED VR AF-S DX NIKKOR Zoom Lens - Deluxe Lens Care & Cleaning Kit
32 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Secure Digital USB Card Reader - Universal Memory Card Wallet - Pack of LCD Screen Protectors
Additional EN-EL14 Reachargeable Lithium ion Replacement Battery Pack - Well Padded Multi Compartment Gadget Bag with Pockets & Strap
Full Size 59" Tripod W/Case - Jumpstart Guide to Digital SLR Cameras - BONUS!! HDMI cable for HDTV connection - Free 25 Quality Prints (Promo code # on invoice)
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D3200 24.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G AF-S DX VR and 55-300mm f/4.5-5.6G ED VR AF-S DX NIKKOR Zoom Lenses + EN-EL14 Battery + 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
